description: Manage Azure DevOps organization level operations.

commands.name: az devops configure
commands.summary: Configure the Azure DevOps CLI or view your configuration.

commands.name: az devops invoke
commands.summary: This command will invoke request for any DevOps area and resource. Please use only json output as the response of this command is not fixed. Helpful docs - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/.
commands.syntax:
az devops invoke [--accept-media-type]
                 [--api-version]
                 [--area]
                 [--detect {false, true}]
                 [--encoding {ascii, utf-16be, utf-16le, utf-8}]
                 [--http-method {DELETE, GET, HEAD, OPTIONS, PATCH, POST, PUT}]
                 [--in-file]
                 [--media-type]
                 [--org]
                 [--out-file]
                 [--query-parameters]
                 [--resource]
                 [--route-parameters]
examples:
az devops invoke --area wiki --resource wikis --route-parameters project={Project Name} -o json
az devops invoke --area wiki --resource wikis --route-parameters project=WikiIssue -o json

commands.name: az devops login
commands.summary: Set the credential (PAT) to use for a particular organization.

commands.name: az devops logout
commands.summary: Clear the credential for all or a particular organization.
